smell_analysis.justification: The diagram 'Ülesannete registri eskiismudel' on page 9 is empty.
In the use case diagram 'Ülesannete funktsionaalne allsüsteem' (page 2), the use case 'Tuvasta kasutaja' is not associated with any actor.
No duplicate use case names associated with the same actor were found.
No packages containing multiple elements with the same name were found.
No obvious redundant data columns without foreign keys were found.
Use case naming appears consistent (Verb-Noun structure in Estonian).
In the state diagram 'Ülesande seisundidiagramm' (page 7), the state 'Lõpetatud' has no incoming transitions, making it unreachable from the start state.
All actions in the activity diagrams appear to be reachable.
All relevant relationships in class/database diagrams have multiplicity indicators.
The use case diagram 'Ülesannete funktsionaalne allsüsteem' (page 2) contains 16 central elements (use cases), which exceeds the limit of less than 10.

In the diagram 'Ülesannete register' (page 8), the class 'Ülesanne' has 7 visual connection lines to other classes (Projekt, Töötaja, Klassifikaator, Vastutaja_ülesandes, Tagasilükkamise_põhjendus, Tühistamise_põhjendus, Ootele_panemise_põhjendus), exceeding the limit of less than 6.
No elements were found to be excessively distant from related elements.

In the activity diagram 'Ülesande kinnitamise tegevusdiagramm' (page 3), the action 'Ülesande kinnitamise otsustamine' is a noun phrase ('Deciding...') rather than starting with an active verb (e.g., 'Otsusta...').
No element names with 3 or fewer characters were found (excluding standard abbreviations like 'id' within stereotypes or suffixes).
Class names start with uppercase letters and are singular.
Attribute/column names start with lowercase letters.
No invalid Hungarian notation or prefixes were found in element names.
